title: Ranked 3's BEING TEASED AGAIN

embed.description: I posted on this board, on November 26th 2014, asking riot about their ranked 3's, why it was up and if it was going to continue and i was given this response by a riot member. \"Hey xXxRENEGADEZ, yes it was an incident.

body:
Ranked 3's was once again enabled for a short duration today (16th Jan) before being taken down. As in my previous post, from December (link provided), I believe there is well and truly enough of an oceanic league community to warrant at the very LEAST, 12 hours of ranked 3's game play per week. 

-------------------------

For a full and more detailed discussion follow the link to the previous post in which riot employees have basically said, get stuffed.
Thank you for your time.

-----------------------

May we get ranked TT in the very near future.

replies.body: Fully support, I don't think Riot is giving us enough credit in what game mode we partake in. I believe we have the population in doing so, and even if takes a few minutes extra for a game, who cares, it'll all be worth it :). It's easier to get 3 people for Twisted Treeline than 5 people for Summoner's Rift.
im really getting sick of only playing blind pick twisted treeline. having ranked up should be a priority for riot games oce.
